content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Facility at Position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
  - Currently out of fuel and lacking ingredients to smelt.
  - Status: No fuel, no ingredients to smelt.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity. For example, attempting to place a stone furnace without having it in the inventory will result in an error.
- Verify that the target location is suitable for placing an entity. Avoid attempting to place entities where there are existing objects in the way.

### Errors related to crafting and inventory management
- Ensure you have sufficient resources in your inventory before crafting. For instance, attempting to craft a Stone Furnace without enough stone will cause an error.
- Keep track of your inventory levels to avoid assertion errors related to insufficient resources, such as iron ore.

### Errors when extracting items from entities
- Confirm that the entity contains the items you wish to extract. Attempting to extract iron plates from a stone furnace that does not contain them will result in an error.
